description:
The Mifune Dolphin`s opponent for the 2nd match of the summer tournament will be the Nijigaoka Beatles.
The Beatles` ace player Tamaki is exceptionally tall for a grade schooler and brings his arcing slow ball to the fight.
As he had gone to observe them before, Urabe could warn the team of the odd style pitches.
On top of that, the Beatles` coach Komori had once been a solid enough player to be battery with Daigo`s dad, Gorou, and he even used to coach the Dolphins before...
Now Daigo has to face a team full of tricks and surprises!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Experience Level of the Catcher
キャッチャーの経験値
